channel.title: Web on Guy Evans
channel.description: Recent content in Web on Guy Evans

item.title: A look at Caddy - A simple and fast web server
item.description: We’ve all used Apache and NGNIX when we have had to host a website and they are fin but let’s be honest, I’ve never gotten along with their config. And that is what bought me to Caddy. Lets take a look at what Caddy has to offer.
